channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Verify Access Appliance
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Verify Access Appliance

item.title: CVE-2023-38267|2024-08-02T17:39:12.302Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Appliance (IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.6.1 and IBM Security Verify Access Docker 10.0.6.1) could allow a local user to possibly elevate their privileges due to sensitive configuration information being exposed. IBM X-Force ID: 260584.

item.title: CVE-2023-31006|2024-08-02T14:45:24.791Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Container (IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.6.1 and IBM Security Verify Access Docker 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.6.1) is vulnerable to a denial of service attacks on the DSC server. IBM X-Force ID: 254776.

item.title: CVE-2023-32327|2024-08-02T15:10:24.883Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Container (IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.6.1 and IBM Security Verify Access Docker 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.6.1) is vulnerable to an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 254783.

item.title: CVE-2023-31001|2024-08-02T14:45:24.397Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Container (IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.6.1 and IBM Security Verify Access Docker 10.0.6.1) temporarily stores sensitive information in files that could be accessed by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 254653.

item.title: CVE-2023-43016|2024-08-02T19:37:22.487Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Container (IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.6.1 and IBM Security Verify Access Docker 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.6.1) could allow a remote user to log into the server due to a user account with an empty password. IBM X-Force ID: 266154.

item.title: CVE-2023-32329|2024-08-02T15:10:24.882Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Container (IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.6.1 and IBM Security Verify Access Docker 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.6.1) could allow a user to download files from an incorrect repository due to improper file validation. IBM X-Force ID: 254972.

item.title: CVE-2023-31003|2024-08-02T14:45:24.443Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Container (IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.6.1 and IBM Security Verify Access Docker 10.0.6.1) could allow a local user to obtain root access due to improper access controls. IBM X-Force ID: 254658.

item.title: CVE-2023-31004|2024-08-02T14:45:24.443Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Container (IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.6.1 and IBM Security Verify Access Docker 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.6.1) could allow a remote attacker to gain access to the underlying system using man in the middle techniques. IBM X-Force ID: 254765.

item.title: CVE-2023-31005|2024-08-02T14:45:25.281Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Container (IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.6.1 and IBM Security Verify Access Docker 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.6.1) could allow a local user to escalate their privileges due to an improper security configuration. IBM X-Force ID: 254767.

item.title: CVE-2023-30999|2024-08-02T14:45:24.419Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Container (IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.6.1 and IBM Security Verify Access Docker 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.6.1) could allow an attacker to cause a denial of service due to uncontrolled resource consumption. IBM X-Force ID: 254651.

item.title: CVE-2023-43017|2024-08-02T19:37:22.925Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.6.1 could allow a privileged user to install a configuration file that could allow remote access. IBM X-Force ID: 266155.

item.title: CVE-2023-38369|2024-08-02T17:39:13.388Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Container 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.6.1 does not require that docker images should have strong passwords by default, which makes it easier for attackers to compromise user accounts. IBM X-Force ID: 261196.

item.title: CVE-2023-32328|2024-08-02T15:10:24.887Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.6.1 uses insecure protocols in some instances that could allow an attacker on the network to take control of the server. IBM X-Force Id: 254957.

item.title: CVE-2023-32330|2024-08-02T15:10:24.819Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.6.1 uses insecure calls that could allow an attacker on the network to take control of the server. IBM X-Force ID: 254977.

item.title: CVE-2024-31872|2024-08-02T01:59:49.966Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0 through 10.0.7 could allow a malicious actor to conduct a man in the middle attack when deploying Open Source scripts due to missing certificate validation. IBM X-Force ID: 287316.

item.title: CVE-2024-31871|2024-08-02T01:59:50.562Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0 through 10.0.7 could allow a malicious actor to conduct a man in the middle attack when deploying Python scripts due to improper certificate validation. IBM X-Force ID: 287306.

item.title: CVE-2024-31874|2024-08-02T01:59:50.546Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0 through 10.0.7 uses uninitialized variables when deploying that could allow a local user to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 287318.

item.title: CVE-2024-31873|2024-08-02T01:59:49.967Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0 through 10.0.7 contains hard-coded credentials which it uses for its own inbound authentication that could be obtained by a malicious actor. IBM X-Force ID: 287317.

item.title: CVE-2024-31872|2024-07-12T20:53:59.356Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0 through 10.0.7 could allow a malicious actor to conduct a man in the middle attack when deploying Open Source scripts due to missing certificate validation. IBM X-Force ID: 287316.

item.description: IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0 through 10.0.7 could allow a malicious actor to conduct a man in the middle attack when deploying Python scripts due to improper certificate validation. IBM X-Force ID: 287306.

item.description: IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0 through 10.0.7 could allow a malicious actor to conduct a man in the middle attack when deploying Python scripts due to improper certificate validation. IBM X-Force ID: 287306.

item.description: IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0 through 10.0.7 contains hard-coded credentials which it uses for its own inbound authentication that could be obtained by a malicious actor. IBM X-Force ID: 287317.

item.description: IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0 through 10.0.7 uses uninitialized variables when deploying that could allow a local user to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 287318.
